name: screeenly
description: Create screenshots of websites through a simple API

APP_ENV.description: The environment the app should run in

APP_KEY.description: Application secret key. Used for encryption.

APP_DEBUG.description: If debug mode should be enabled

APP_URL.description: The URL your app will be available from

SCREEENLY_DISK.description: Filesystem Disk where Screenshots should be stored

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The AWS access key to access your bucket

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The AWS secret key to access your bucket

AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.description: The AWS region where files should be stored (eg. eu-central-1)

AWS_BUCKET.description: The bucket where your files will be stored

AWS_URL.description: URL where you're files will be hosted (https://BUCKET.s3.DEFAULT_REGION.amazonaws.com)
